com.emnify.sdk.client

Class EMnify

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emnify.sdk.client.EMnify

  • public class EMnify
extends Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static EMnify authenticate()
      Performs api client authorization according to configured system environment variables: EMNIFY_APPLICATION_TOKEN - is used for Application Token Authentication EMNIFY_USERNAME and EMNIFY_USERNAME - are used for User Authentication
      static EMnify authenticate(String appToken)
      Performs api client authorization with application token
      static EMnify authenticate(String username, String password)
      Performs api client authorization with user/password combination
      EndpointClient buildEndpointClient() 
      boolean isAuthenticationExpired()
      Checks if authentication token is expired
      void refreshAuthIfNecessary()
      Refresh auth token if it is expired and refresh token is not expired

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        public static EMnify authenticate()
                           throws SdkException
        Performs api client authorization according to configured system environment variables:
        • EMNIFY_APPLICATION_TOKEN - is used for Application Token Authentication
        • EMNIFY_USERNAME and EMNIFY_USERNAME - are used for User Authentication
        Returns:
        instance of authorized EMnify Client
        Throws:
        SdkException - if authentication failed

      • authenticate

        public static EMnify authenticate(String username,
                                  String password)
                           throws SdkException
        Performs api client authorization with user/password combination
        Parameters:
        username - username
        password - password
        Returns:
        instance of authorized EMnify Client
        Throws:
        SdkException - if authentication failed

      • authenticate

        public static EMnify authenticate(String appToken)
                           throws SdkException
        Performs api client authorization with application token
        Parameters:
        appToken - application token value
        Returns:
        instance of authorized EMnify Client
        Throws:
        SdkException - if authentication failed

      • isAuthenticationExpired

        public boolean isAuthenticationExpired()
        Checks if authentication token is expired
        Returns:
        true if auth_token is expired otherwise false

      • refreshAuthIfNecessary

        public void refreshAuthIfNecessary()
                            throws SdkException
        Refresh auth token if it is expired and refresh token is not expired
        Throws:
        SdkException - if attempt of authentication failed

      • buildEndpointClient

        public EndpointClient buildEndpointClient()
